name: Urim and Thummim
shortDescription: The Sacred Oracular Instruments of Divine Revelation
fullDescription:
The Sacred Oracular Instruments of Divine Revelation The Urim and Thummim are among the most mysterious objects in biblical tradition. Housed within
                    the High Priest's breastplate (choshen), they served as sacred instruments for seeking divine
                    guidance on matters of national importance. Despite their prominence in Scripture, their exact
                    nature and method of operation remain unknown.

properties.name: Purpose
properties.value: Seeking divine guidance on important matters
